parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

*   Pages start from page 1.
*   Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

*   Maximum value: 50.
*   Default value: 10

parameters.name: SecurityGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the security group.

parameters.name: SecurityGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the security group.
